pages.text: Claiming is a feature of HexMC used to protect your items and structures. You can claim up to 9 chunks. You can start claiming using a golden hoe and clicking the corners of the area you would like to claim

pages.title: Useful commands
pages.text: $(thing)/flan menu$() access permissions and menu options $(br2) $(thing)/flan delete$() Delete a claim your standing in.
